Load a genome from the specified file.

Type Parameter
T

Connection weight data type.

Parameters

string

The name and path of the file to load.

metaNeatGenome
MetaNeatGenome<T>

A MetaNeatGenome{T} instance; required to construct a new MetaNeatGenome{T}.

genomeId
int

The ID to assign to the new genome.

Returns

A new instance of NeatGenome{T}.
